name: cut_by_metric
label: Cut DS by metric
description: Cuts a dataset relatively to criteria over values of a unique metric

inputs.name: ds_name
inputs.label: DSname
inputs.description: Dataset to cut by criteria on metric

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description: Unique metric used as reference to cut the dataset
parameters.label: Metric (M)

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description: Python expression determining the retention conditions over the selected metric (M). Example : (M>5) and (M<10) and (M not in [7,8])
parameters.label: Cut condition

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Criterion used to group timeseries (sharing the same value). Leave blank to not group.
parameters.label: Group by

parameters.name: fid_pattern
parameters.description: Python pattern determining format of output functional identifiers. Example : {fid}_{M}_cut where '{fid}' is the Functional Identifier of the original time series and '{M}' is metric.
parameters.label: FuncId pattern

outputs.name: ts_list
outputs.label: TS list
outputs.description: List of cut TS (same order as input)
